title: James Allison on DAS, the mighty W11 and Mercedes’ dominance
description: Mercedes technical director James Allison chats to Laurence Edmondson about the team’s dominant year, how F1 could become more competitive and the future of the sport in an ever-changing world.
itunes:title: James Allison on DAS, the mighty W11 and Mercedes’ dominance
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Mercedes technical director James Allison chats to Laurence Edmondson about the team’s dominant year, how F1 could become more competitive and the future of the sport in an ever-changing world.
